name: @gainsnetwork/gtoken-subgraph
description: A subgraph that indexes gToken events
author: thebuidler

scripts.deploy:hosted: npx graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --access-token ${GRAPH_ACCESS_TOKEN}
scripts.configure:mumbai: yarn clean && yarn generate:schema && yarn prepare:mumbai && yarn codegen
scripts.configure:polygon: yarn clean && yarn generate:schema && yarn prepare:polygon && yarn codegen
scripts.configure:arbitrum: yarn clean && yarn generate:schema && yarn prepare:arbitrum && yarn codegen
scripts.configure:base: yarn clean && yarn generate:schema && yarn prepare:base && yarn codegen
scripts.configure:apechain-alchemy: yarn clean && yarn generate:schema && yarn prepare:apechain-alchemy && yarn codegen
scripts.deploy:mumbai: yarn clean && yarn configure:mumbai && yarn deploy:hosted thebuidler/gtoken-mumbai-mc1
scripts.deploy:polygon: yarn clean && yarn configure:polygon && yarn deploy:studio gtoken-polygon-mc1
scripts.deploy:arbitrum: yarn clean && yarn configure:arbitrum && yarn deploy:studio gtoken-arbitrum-mc1
scripts.deploy:base: yarn clean && yarn configure:base && yarn deploy:studio gtoken-base
scripts.deploy:apechain-alchemy: yarn clean && yarn configure:apechain-alchemy && yarn deploy:alchemy gtoken-apechain
